Posts.HTML:
I find having to use the foreground script command to change to custom colours a nuisance, because I can't do it in-line. I think a cool feature would be the following:

colour <c1; 5090FF>
colour <c2; 5010FF>
...
colour <c9; 2090FF>

Then:

msg <|c1This is text in the first colour. |c2This is text in the second colour. ... |c9This is text in the ninth color.>

Posts.EditableText:
You're right that colours are a bit of a pain at the moment - they haven't really changed since Quest 1.0.

I think a better solution will be to cover this as part of a revamp of formatting codes, using something more HTML-like to give you greater control. This won't happen for Quest 4.1 though, but some version afterwards.
